column4: Guys, I'm having a problem running games such as tuxckart and quake2 etc, they just crash after trying to display any gfx :(
geforce 68000
paulaoust: yes i have
what does glxgears -printfps give you in way of fps readings
than its not working in 3d did you install nvidia-settings and nvidia-glx?
also what version of ubuntu?
i sure did
it's breezy
i specified 128 the amount on my card
did you run the enable command?
yes
did you run sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver xorg and make sure your seeing right card and nvidia drivers?
yes xorg is setup correctly i went through it again recently with no problems, everything seems fine
than i would say reboot if everything is installed and set up right you should have it (is the card good?)
yes the card is good i hope i am going to reboot now..i'll be right back
you still here?
i've noticed my cpu jumps to 100% when i run glxgears
how much memory do you have?
256mb
try running sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and leave the memory for vc blank
ok i will give it a try
